casebody.data:
CLEVELAND METRO. BAR ASSN.
v.
THOMAS 2017-1730 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 21, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

DISCIPLINARY CASES

On order to show cause. Respondent, Sam Thomas III, Attorney Registration No. 0067848, last known address in Euclid, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to comply with the court's August 16, 2018 suspension order. Previously imposed stay of suspension revoked and respondent suspended from the practice of law until respondent pays board costs of $ 3.37 and any interest due and has applied for and been granted reinstatement.
